overview: Rıdvan and Umut, who make a living by collecting garbage and hoping on the corners of the street, become one of the leading recyclers of the market, with the secret game of slowly overthrowing the king of Zanyar, whose name only entered their world, and sitting at the top of the recycling market. Fırat goes after Zanyar to prevent everything from being taken away from him. And the war begins.
title: ZANYAR: A Recycling Mafia
